name: Calculated hours IS Riser Diagrams
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(IS Riser Diagrams:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Implementation_Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){<* Eval(((4 * <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Riser_Diagrams_(0-250))*>) + ((<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Reviews_(add_Asbuilts)_(2-5))*> * <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Riser_Diagrams_(0-250))*>) * 0.25))) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Implementation_Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(IS_GES_Location.None)*>)){<* Eval(((4 * <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Riser_Diagrams_(0-250))*>) + ((<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Reviews_(add_Asbuilts)_(2-5))*>* <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Riser_Diagrams_(0-250))*>) * 0.25)))*>}{<* Eval (((4 *<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Riser_Diagrams_(0-250))*> ) + ((<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Reviews_(add_Asbuilts)_(2-5))*> * <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Riser_Diagrams_(0-250))*>) * 0.25))*1.1)*>}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
